alert.note: Alert for Northern Saratoga; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 5:28PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN WASHINGTON... SOUTHERN SARATOGA...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which may rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 528 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was over Saratoga Springs moving east at 10 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This band of heavy snow will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Southern Washington, north central Southern Saratoga and southeastern Northern Saratoga Counties. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 13S and 15. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&

area.areaDesc: Northern Saratoga; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington
